SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class Gui

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.Gui
public class Gui extends javafx.application.Application
Gui class represents the main GUI application for the game Codex Naturalis. It handles the initialization of scenes, controllers, and the primary stage. It also provides methods to switch scenes, send messages, and handle game states.
